mapper.sql: and ( cop_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or cop_subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or cop_owner like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )
mapper.select: select concat('cop',COP_SEQ.NEXTVAL) as copCode from dual

INSERT INTO cop ( cop_code, cop_name, cop_regdate, cop_type, cop_detail, cop_subject, cop_owner, cop_bannerimg, cop_profileimg ) VALUES ( #{copCode}, #{copName}, sysdate, #{copType}, #{copDetail}, #{copSubject}, #{copOwner}, #{copBannerimg}, #{copProfileimg} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO copmember ( emp_id, cop_code, copm_auth ) VALUES ( #{copUserId}, #{copCode}, '2' )
mapper.select: SELECT cop_code, cop_name, cop_regdate, cop_type, cop_detail, cop_subject, cop_owner, cop_bannerimg, cop_profileimg FROM cop where not cop_type = '0'

select B.COP_CODE, B.COP_DETAIL, B.COP_NAME, B.COP_REGDATE, B.COP_SUBJECT, B.COP_TYPE, B.COP_OWNER from copmember a, cop b where b.cop_code = a.cop_code and not a.copm_auth = 0 and a.emp_id = #{empId} order by b.cop_code desc
SELECT count(*) FROM cop a, copmember b where A.COP_CODE = B.COP_CODE and B.EMP_ID = #{empId} and not B.COPM_AUTH = 0
select count(cop_code) as copPersonnel from copmember where cop_code = #{copCode} and not copm_auth = 0

select B.COP_CODE, B.COP_DETAIL, B.COP_NAME, B.COP_REGDATE, B.COP_SUBJECT, B.COP_TYPE, B.COP_OWNER from copmember a, cop b where b.cop_code = a.cop_code and a.copm_auth = 2 and a.emp_id = #{empId} order by b.cop_code desc
select count(*) from copmember a, cop b where b.cop_code = a.cop_code and a.copm_auth = 2 and a.emp_id = #{empId}
SELECT cop_code, cop_name, cop_regdate, cop_type, cop_detail, cop_subject, cop_owner, cop_bannerimg, cop_profileimg FROM cop where cop_code = #{copCode}
select count(cop_name) from cop where cop_name = #{copName}

SELECT a.cop_code, a.cop_name, a.cop_regdate, a.cop_type, a.cop_detail, a.cop_subject, a.cop_owner, a.cop_bannerimg, a.cop_profileimg, count(b.emp_id) as copPersonnel FROM cop a, copmember b where a.cop_code = b.cop_code and not b.copm_auth = 0 group by a.cop_code, a.cop_name, a.cop_regdate, a.cop_type, a.cop_detail, a.cop_subject, a.cop_owner, a.cop_bannerimg, a.cop_profileimg order by copPersonnel desc

SELECT a.cop_code, a.cop_name, a.cop_regdate, a.cop_type, a.cop_detail, a.cop_subject, a.cop_owner, a.cop_bannerimg, a.cop_profileimg, count(B.FDIS_CODE) as fdisCode FROM cop a, FAMILYDISCUSSION b where a.cop_code = b.cop_code group by a.cop_code, a.cop_name, a.cop_regdate, a.cop_type, a.cop_detail, a.cop_subject, a.cop_owner, a.cop_bannerimg, a.cop_profileimg order by fdisCode desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO copmember ( emp_id, cop_code, copm_auth ) VALUES ( #{copUserId}, #{copCode}, '0' )
mapper.select: SELECT ca_code, cop_code, emp_id, ca_title, ca_content, ca_regdate, ca_enabled, ca_viewcnt, emp_name FROM coparchive where cop_code = #{str}
SELECT fdis_code, cop_code, fdis_maker, fdis_name, fdis_regdate FROM familydiscussion where cop_code = #{str}
select a.fdis_code, a.fdis_name, c.cop_name, a.fdis_maker from FAMILYDISCUSSION a, FAMILYDISCUSSIONMEMBER b, cop c where a.fdis_code = b.fdis_code and a.COP_CODE = c.COP_CODE and b.emp_id = #{empId}
select a.ca_code, a.ca_title, b.cop_name from COPARCHIVE a, cop b where a.cop_code = b.cop_code and a.emp_id = #{empId}
SELECT ca_code, cop_code, emp_id, ca_title, ca_content, ca_regdate, ca_enabled, ca_viewcnt, emp_name FROM coparchive where ca_code = #{str}
SELECT ca_at_no, ca_code, ca_at_path, ca_at_name, ca_at_type FROM coparchiveattach where ca_code = #{str}
